# KiloSilverBars.com
> Independent educational resource about kilo silver bars (1,000 grams / 32.15 troy ounces).

## Site Purpose

KiloSilverBars.com is an independent educational resource dedicated to helping investors understand kilo silver bars, a popular choice for those seeking substantial silver positions with competitive premiums.

**Important clarifications:**
- This site does NOT sell silver bars or precious metals
- We are NOT affiliated with any dealers, refiners, or brokers
- We do NOT provide financial advice or investment recommendations
- We do NOT endorse any specific dealer or product
- Content is for educational purposes only

## Key Pages

### /live-silver-prices
Live silver pricing and market education:
- Real-time kilo silver bar prices via Monex API
- Silver spot prices (per troy ounce) via Monex API
- Interactive price charts
- Explanation of spot price vs kilo bar price
- Premium structure education (3-6% typical for kilo bars)

### /resources
Educational library with comprehensive guides covering:
- Understanding kilo bar premiums
- Size comparisons (1 oz vs 10 oz vs kilo bars)
- Storage options for kilo bars
- Brand comparisons (PAMP, Valcambi, Heraeus, RCM, Perth Mint)
- Silver market dynamics
- Bid-ask spreads explained
- Authentication and refiner standards
- Wholesale vs retail markets
- Portfolio allocation strategies

### /where-to-buy-kilo-silver-bars
Independent buying guide covering:
- How to evaluate dealers
- Online bullion dealers (multiple sources listed)
- Local coin shops
- Marketplaces and auctions
- Storage programs
- Price comparison resources

## Pricing Data

**Data Source:** Live pricing data is fetched from the Monex API:
- Kilo Silver Bar price: SBK (1 Kilo Silver Bar product code)
- Silver spot price (per ounce): SBSPOT (Silver Spot Price)

**Important notes:**
- Prices are fetched once per page load (no real-time streaming)
- Data is displayed for educational purposes only
- Users should cross-check prices with multiple sources before transacting
- We recommend comparing prices at: Monex, Kitco, and dealer sites

## Product Specifications

Kilo Silver Bar Key Specifications:
- Weight: 1,000 grams (32.15 troy ounces, approximately 2.2 pounds)
- Purity: .999 fine silver (standard)
- Format: Bars from recognized refiners (PAMP, Valcambi, Heraeus, RCM, Perth Mint, etc.)
- Approximate Value: Varies with spot price - check live pricing
- Premium Range: 3-6% over spot (competitive for physical silver)
